TextBlock.Text: Solara: You know, for life forms that can use the <color=orange>4th Dimension</color>, they do seem to lack artistic talent.
Lotus: Like you could do better!
Solara: I can! ...Not that this makes this discovery bad or anything.
Kestrel: Regardless, it seems like they're stringed together to form instructions.
Lotus: I get the tesseract, but what's the circle? Like moving around in a circle?
Solara: Perhaps it means moving around the perimeter of something.
Lotus: Looks like it might have some sort of effect on that <color=orange>monolith</color> I found before winding up here.
